comments.body: probably worth adding an `else if rpod != nil { log something special about an update that failed }`
For the sake of using the type system for private/public checking we can move this source into contrib/mesos/pkg/executor/source.

right, we talked about this. i wasn't crazy about moving this into its own package simply for type private/public checking -- i'm not expecting anyone to abuse this, and it's ugly hack/glue code which is why I think it belongs in /service
